title: 화이트리스트 조건은 어떻게 되나요?
content: 화이트리스트는 뽑지 않습니다. ?월 ?일 Article 페이지에 게시될 글을 확인해 주세요.

title: 민팅은 어디서 하나요?
content: 민팅은 자체 페이지를 이용하여 진행될 예정이며, 링크는 민팅 직전에 공지할 예정입니다.

title: CREAMFIELDS 외 홀더 베네핏이 있나요?
content: 당연히 CREAMFIELDS 외에도 다양한 혜택이 있습니다. 자세한 내용은 홈페이지 내 Benefit을 참고해 주세요

title: When is the D-DAY?
content: Minting will be held on August 26, 2022.

title: What (How big) is the total volume of issue?
What is the minting price?
content: It will be announced on library and discord on ? / ?

title: How do I sign up to the whitelist?
content: There will be no whitelist for this project. We will notify on the library on ? / ?

title: Where can I mint the :OKRA STAY?
content: The address for minting is going to be announced before the drop.

title: What is :OKRA STAY?
content: :OKRA STAY is a culture spaces provided by OKRA.

title: Are there any holder benefits other than CREAM FIELDS?
content: Not only the CREAM FIELDS, lots of benefits will be provide to holders. For further information, please refer to BENEFITS on our website.
